body: I'm just curious: if user provides the ranges will the engine still have calibration_data? Do we need to call calib_graph_to_infer_graph() after create_inference_graph()? What's the workflow look like?
body_html: I'm just curious: if user provides the ranges will the engine still have calibration_data? Do we need to call calib_graph_to_infer_graph() after create_inference_graph()? What's the workflow look like?
